General.Name: Shanghai Maling Aquarius Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Maling Aquarius Co.,Ltd engages in the production, manufacture, and distribution of food products in China. The company offers meat products, including beef and mutton, as well as distributes snack and integrated foods. It offers its products under the Merlin, Guanshengyuan, Zhengguanghe, SF, Sushi, Aisen, White Rabbit, Bergamot, Huatuo, and 96858 brands. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.
